Question: This person made a few cameo appearances as the second season wound down; he was eventually replaced by Bill Murray.
Hints: This person was a member of an early underground comedy ensemble called Channel One which he co-founded in 1967.
At the height of his career in the late 1980s, this person earned around $7 million per film and was a highly visible celebrity.
This person played drums with the college band The Leather Canary, headed by school friends Walter Becker and Donald Fagen.
